titles.title: Phased Retirement Liberalization Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow distributions to be made from certain pension plans before the participant is separated from employment.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/12/2000--Introduced. Phased Retirement Liberalization Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow certain pension distributions prior to employment severance if made before the earliest of a participant's: (1) normal retirement age; (2) attainment of age 59 and one-half; or (3) completion of 30 years' service.
